pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This package provides functions for converting emoji names to emoji characters and vice versa.
How does it differ from the @emoji@ package?
- It supports a fuller range of emojis, including all those supported by GitHub - It supports lookup of emoji aliases from emoji - It uses Text rather than String - It has a lighter dependency footprint: in particular, it does not require aeson - It does not require TemplateHaskell
